round_best: Develop a hybrid denoising model that combines the strengths of Masked Training with Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs). This model would employ a discriminator that evaluates the realism of denoised images, encouraging the generator (using an MT-like architecture) to produce images that are both noise-free and retain high textural fidelity. The integration of adversarial training could help mitigate the over-smoothing typically seen in MT and fine-tune the mask ratios adaptively during training based on discriminator feedback.
